EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-04-13-AWS-SummitSF-PostShow.AWS SummitSF PostShow 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Your AWS Summit SF Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for stopping by the Turbonomic booth at AWS Summit San Francisco. As promised, here is a resource that shows how we help our customers migrate to the cloud:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]>
Turbonomic can help you reduce your projected cloud spend by optimizing your on-premise workloads before migration and determining needed AWS Reserved Instance (RI) capacity.
Learn more and start your migration with confidence.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
